message: Let's split fairly considering the inflation penalty we both face
Your offer was a good starting point, but I need a bit more to make it worth the risk of continuing. This offer accounts for the inflation we both face.
Considering the increased inflation impact on your end, I've adjusted the split to still favor me but be more considerate of your loss.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's clear we both want a larger share, but time is literally money for us. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at the value even more.
